text: Aur aap agar cheh ehal-e-kitab ko tamam daleelen dey den lekin woh aap kay qiblay ki pairwi nahi keren gay aur na aap inn kay qiblay ko manney walay hain aur na yeh aapas mein aik doosray kay qiblay ko manney walay hain aur agar aap ba wajood yeh kay aap kay pass ilm aa chuka phir bhi inn ki khuwaishon kay peechay lag jayen to bil yaqeen aap bhi zalimon mein say hojayen
